attributes.action: Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination
attributes.additional_details: The Government must specifically outlaw discrimination based on vaccine status, this includes access to private businesses, jobs and public life. No individual should ever feel coerced into having a vaccine.
attributes.background: The individual must remain sovereign over their own body, discrimination against those who cannot or will not be vaccinated against COVID is incompatible with a free democracy. The Government must take firm action to prevent 'vaccination passports' and discriminatory 'no jab, no job' policies.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
